gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Pistons 129, Raptors 127
gameRecap.excerpt: The Pistons snap a 28-game losing streak and defeat the Raptors, 129-127, and improve to 3-29 on the year. Cade Cunningham led Detroit with 30 points and 12 assists as Bojan Bogdanovic (19 points, seven rebounds) and Jalen Duren (18 points, 17 rebounds) totaled 37 points. Pascal Siakam led the Raptors with 35 points, five rebounds, and four assists as Dennis Schroder (season-high 30 points, nine assists) and Gary Trent Jr. (24 points, six 3PT, four AST) totaled 54 points. The Raptors move to 12-20 on the year.
